overview: Hang 10 with some of the world's elite surfers -- including Tom Curren, Kelly Slater and Andy Irons -- as they ride the biggest waves and perform the coolest tricks from stunning beaches in Indonesia, Mexico, Australia and Hawaii. Veteran surf-film director Josh Pomer will keep you on the edge of your seat with his combination of knockout surf footage and a kickin' soundtrack courtesy of bands such as Pennywise, Soccer Mom and Civil Unrest.
title: Destination Point
